title: HOP! Air France
summary: New design to access essential services:booking,check-in,flight status,timetable
description: HOP! discover a new and easy way to travel !New design to access to all our essential services : booking, check-in, flight status, timetable... Our app is here for you during all your trips.Our app benefits: BOOKING: Book a flights directly wihtin the app, it's easy, convenient and fast. CHECK-IN AND BOARDING PASS: Check-in and retrieve your boarding passe(s) directly within the app. If you wish, you may also add your boarding passe(s) to Wallet.CHECK AND MANAGE YOUR BOOKING: Thanks to the app you can check, complete or modify the information of your reservation(s) at all times. Need an extra luggage ? Our paid options are also available to make your travel experience as convenient as possible. FLIGHT STATUS AND TIMETABLE:Need to check flights timetable to communicate your arrival time to a colleague or to your relatives ? No worries, you have access to all the news concerning your flight(s) within your app.
descriptionHTML:
HOP! discover a new and easy way to travel !
New design to access to all our essential services : booking, check-in, flight status, timetable... Our app is here for you during all your trips.

Our app benefits:

BOOKING:
Book a flights directly wihtin the app, it's easy, convenient and fast.

CHECK-IN AND BOARDING PASS:
Check-in and retrieve your boarding passe(s) directly within the app. If you wish, you may also add your boarding passe(s) to Wallet.

CHECK AND MANAGE YOUR BOOKING:
Thanks to the app you can check, complete or modify the information of your reservation(s) at all times. Need an extra luggage ? Our paid options are also available to make your travel experience as convenient as possible.

FLIGHT STATUS AND TIMETABLE:
Need to check flights timetable to communicate your arrival time to a colleague or to your relatives ? No worries, you have access to all the news concerning your flight(s) within your app.
comments: It doesn't work. I installed it and all it says is 'Upgrade'. When I push that button, it just takes me back here. Catch 22.
Bon Application Bon UI. Utilisateur application conviviale
Finally it is on mobile I was expecting since long time .. I'm loving it .
Must for HOP! Frequent travelers Booking , check in , flight search everything thing on your hand. UI is rich and good experience.
Nul Franchement debile pas d'apercu que des erruers, valeur ajouté nul. Marche pas bien que 10 mille telechargements, à votre avis?
